titleStmt.title: The humble and hearty representation and ingagement of the collective body of the city of London, and propounded by them to the free-commoners of the the counties, citties, townes and boroughs of the kingdome of England, and the dominion of Wales to, and with both Houses of Parliament, and each one to other.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication taken from Wing (2nd ed.)
Reproduction of original in: University of London. Library.
